The final step is to extrude the 3D model from the scaled and transformed 2D sketch. Extrude the sketch with the following properties: - extrude_depth_towards_normal: 0.2143 - extrude_depth_opposite_normal: 0.0 - operation: Generate a new solid body The resulting shape is a three-dimensional, rectangular prism with the following dimensions: - Length: 0.75 - Width: 0.2143 - Height: 0.75</description>

prompt: <description>Part 1: Three-Dimensional Rectangular Prism Construct a three-dimensional rectangular prism with a flat top and bottom. The sides are parallel and the top and bottom faces are perpendicular to the sides.
